author: cms-L1TK
body:
#### PR description:

In the TTTrack class, which represents L1 tracks, the function stubPtConsistency() was renamed chi2BendRed() some years ago, as the new name gave a clearer idea what this function did. However, the function with the original name was retained in TTTrack, so as to avoid breaking anyone's code, and to give people time to migrate to the new name.

This PR finally deletes funtion stubPtConsistency(), and switches to the new name the few classes that were still using the old function.

This has no effect on L1 tracking performance, since it is only a name change,
title: Delete obsolete TTTrack::stubPtConsistency function
